data.description:
Battle Talent is a **challenging physics-based roguelite sword-fighting** game set in a medieval fantasy world. In this game, you can create your own fighting style and experience unparalleled gameplay in a mega seamless procedural dungeon. With over 80 enemy variants, 100 weapons, and 60 perks, the possibilities are endless.

- Join forces with your friends to take down enemies! Experience rich **multiplayer** interactions and create powerful combos!

{993508985736691}

- Engage in realistic combat in **Mixed Reality Mode** (supports multiplayer) 

{862080482494054}

- Experience thrilling physical combat with **spell, melee, and ranged attacks**. Beware, target the boss!

{1153464909301423}

- Customize your talent points in **Roguelike levels** and unlock unexpected treasure.

{2455464587991559}

- Explore **Sandbox Mode** to experiment with **2000+ mods** and Scene Editor feature.

{1662858931145151}



# Features:

- 5 game modes: Adventure, Challenge, Sandbox, Mixed Reality mode (Quest 3), Multiplayer Mode
- Supports multiplayer mode for 2-4 players and includes a built-in voice chat
- Built-in scripted mod menu with 2000+ mods, enhance your gaming experience
- Thrill of hack-and-slash with realistic physics interactions.
- Variety of enemies and bosses, over 80 enemy variants with different moveset
- Plenty of weapons and perks, over 100 weapons and over 60 perks
- Seamless huge dungeons with multiple landscapes that regenerate each time

Change Log for V11P5:
> New Content
- Brand new adventure, sandbox, and challenge modes, with the ability to seamlessly switch between them.
- Challenge Mode:
  - Independent random dungeons with a unique economy system and currency called "Souls"
  - New facilities and items, such as the Demon Tablet, merchants, and Decomposition Portal.
  - New level rooms.
  - Completely revamped dungeon configurations.
- Sandbox Mode:
  - Unlock all content right from the start.
  - Exclusive Halloween-themed sandbox castle scene.
- New weapon: HarryPair Shield.

> Adjustments
- Balanced many weapons for improved gameplay.
- Some skills that previously required weapon upgrades are now accessible from the beginning.
- Enhanced the handling of certain weapons.
- NPCs exhibit more varied and natural behaviors.
- Adjusted NPC difficulty, including stagger mechanics and attack patterns.
- Improved hand physics and grip sensations.
- Player stagger when attacked is now more realistic and natural.
- Removed dungeon and sandbox levels from the adventure progression.
- Optimized certain dungeon rooms.
- Improved UI usability.

Change Log for V11P2:

Hey guys, our first monthly update is just released, hope you enjoy the game so far. Althogh we call it full release, it's still in actively developing, launching on the store is far from the end of our journey!
Our mod week event is coming on July 16th. Don't forget to give your favorite modder encouragement and support.
Btw, we added an in-game TV. Upload your clips on Tiktok/Youtube/Twitter with BattleTalentPeak tag, or join our Discord/Reddit to share them. They may be displayed to all players in the Talent Temple with your name!

>Mod
